thread.subject: Diwali Discount Offer for Partners
thread.body:
Dear Crimson Peaks Lodge Team,

We are writing to inquire about potential corporate rates for our Diwali partner event. We anticipate needing 20 Deluxe Rooms and 5 Suites for a 3-day stay from November 10th to 12th.  Could you please provide us with your best available rates and any applicable group discounts? We are particularly interested in utilizing your conference hall, 'The Grand Ballroom', for our event.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,
Rajesh Sharma
Lead Event Planner,  Example Corp

thread.subject: Re: Diwali Discount Offer for Partners
thread.body:
Dear Rajesh Sharma,

Thank you for your email.  Unfortunately, I am not authorized to handle corporate rate requests. I will forward this to our Sales Manager who can assist you with your inquiry.

Regards,
Priya Sharma
Front Desk, Crimson Peaks Lodge

thread.subject: Re: Diwali Discount Offer for Partners
thread.body:
Dear Rajesh Sharma,

Thank you for your interest in Crimson Peaks Lodge for your Diwali event. I've received your request for corporate rates.  For your group of 25 rooms (20 Deluxe & 5 Suites) from November 10th-12th, and use of the Grand Ballroom, we can offer a special Diwali discount of 15% off our standard rates. This includes complimentary Wi-Fi and breakfast.

To confirm your booking and receive a detailed quote, please reply to this email.  We look forward to welcoming you to Crimson Peaks Lodge.

Sincerely,
John Doe
Sales Manager, Crimson Peaks Lodge

thread.subject: Re: Diwali Discount Offer for Partners
thread.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for the prompt response and the attractive offer.  We would like to proceed with the booking.  Could you please send us a detailed quote with all inclusions and terms and conditions?

Regards,
Rajesh Sharma
